Summary: I'VE SEEN 3 LOW FLYING ufo's IN THE PAST 6 MONTHS, THERE TRAVEL IS THE SHORTEST WAY TO MOVE ON TO ARIZONA
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around February 19th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsv-SHAPED -CHUCKY DULL BODY WITH NO RUNNING LIGHTS BUT AS IT BANKED A LARGE PALM TREE, IT BANKED BACK TO SHOW PORTAL TYPE LIGHTS. I SAW THIS OBJCET AGAIN ABOUT 2:OO am MOVING MUCH FASTER IN A STRAIGHT LINE AGAIN OVER OUR HOUSE. THE 3RD SIGHTING WAS VERY SIMILAR TO "PHOENIX' LIGHTS WITH 3 RUNNING LIGHTS ON EACH SIDE, BUT ALTERNATE IN A 4.2-3.3. WITH SO MUCH LIGHT IT WAS EASY TO OBSERVE THE SHAPE, FLAT, BOOMERANG, RUNNING LOW & SLOW. THE FACT THAT THESE OBJECTS MADE ABSOLUTELY NO SOUND IS UNNERVING! AND WHERE ARE THEY DURING THE DAY? I PUT MY MONEY ON SOMEWHERE IN THE DESOLATE MTS. OF ARIZONA
